function.name: create_automation_routine
function.description: If the input asks to automate or optimize devices, the home, or specific locations based on price or comfort.  Assume utility prices are available. All devices except Bluetooth can be automated.
examples: - Automate my Thermostat
- Optimize my lights and pool pump
- Can you automate my Batmobile based on utility prices?
- Can you optimize my Ecobee - Thermostat based on utility prices?
- Optimize my home (or house) based on utility prices
- Automate my house Room Hue based on utility prices

devices_or_locations.description: List of devices or locations the customer wants to automate or optimize

original_input.description: The full customer input, for reference and traceability

function.name: utility_price_available_routine
function.description: If the input asks whether utility or energy prices or GHG signals are available.
examples: - Are utility prices available?
- Is the GHG signal available?
- Can I get energy prices?
- Can I access utility prices?
- Do you have utility prices for my devices?
- Are utility prices available for my home?
- Can I optimize my home or devices based on utility signals?

customer_input.description: The full customer input without any modifications

function.name: which_device_automatable
function.description: If the user asks which devices can be automated or optimized.
examples: - Which devices are eligible for optimization?
- Can you list devices that can be automated?
- What devices can I optimize based on utility prices?
- Which devices can I automate based on utility prices?
- Can I optimize my batmobile based on utility prices?
- Can I optimize my thermostat (tstat) based on utility prices?
- Can I optimize my home based on utility prices?
- Can I optimize my hue based on utility prices?
- Which devices can be automated?
- Which devices can I optimize?
- Can you tell me which devices are suitable for automation?
- Are there specific devices that can be automated or optimized?

function.name: general_nucore_info
function.category: IoX and NuCore and NuCore.AI Concepts and Information
function.description: If the input asks about IoX or NuCore.AI concepts like plugins, editors, profiles, unit of measure (UOM), or properties. Assume IoX, NuCore, and NuCore.AI are synonymous
examples: - What is NuCore.AI?
- Can you explain IoX?
- What are plugins in NuCore?
- How do I use the editor in IoX?
- What is a profile in NuCore.AI?
- Can you tell me about unit of measure (UOM) in IoX?
- What properties are available in NuCore?
- What are editors in NuCore?
- How do I use plugins in NuCore
- What is uom?
- What is UOM?
- What is unit of measure?

function.name: get_comfort_settings
function.description: If the user wants to retrieve their comfort or savings levels. If missing, default to Normal.
examples: - What are my comfort settings?
- Can you tell me my savings mode?
- What is my current comfort level?
- How do I check my comfort settings?
- What is the current savings mode?
- What are my savings settings?
- What comfort levels do I have?
- What savings levels do I have?

mode.description: either of savings, saving, or comfort. If not specified, defaults to comfort.

function.name: set_comfort_settings
function.description: If the user wants to set comfort or savings levels. If the level is not specified or unrecognized, default to Normal.
examples: - Set my comfort level to High
- Change my savings mode to Moderate
- I want to set my comfort settings to Normal
- Adjust my savings level to High
- Can you set my comfort mode to Moderate?
- Set my comfort settings to Low
- Set my comfort settings to Normal
- Set my comfort settings to Moderate
- Set my comfort settings to High
- Set my savings settings to Normal
- Set my savings settings to Moderate
- Set my savings settings to High

level.description: Extracted comfort settings from the customer input: Normal, Moderate, or High. If not specified, defaults to Normal.

function.name: pass_to_system
function.description: If the question does not match any of the use cases above
examples: - What is the weather like today?
- Can you tell me a joke?
- What is the capital of France?
- Can you help me with my homework?
- What is the meaning of life?

customer_input.description: The full customer input without any modifications
